text: Meanwhile, Moses was shepherding the flock of his father-in-law Jethro,3:1 Mosesâ€™ father-in-law Jethro was also called Reuel; see Exodus 2:18. the priest of Midian. He led the flock to the far side of the wilderness and came to Horeb,3:1 That is, Mount Sinai, or possibly a mountain in the range containing Mount Sinai the mountain of God.
